Question: Brewers in Scranton, PA and other cities challenged this person to escape from a barrel after they filled it with beer.
Hints: This person died of peritonitis from a ruptured appendix at 1:26 p.m.
This person made the only known recordings of his voice on Edison wax cylinders on October 29, 1914, in Flatbush, New York.
Police forbade him from using one of the piers, so this person hired a tugboat and invited press on board.
